ticket.title: grouped_options_for_select returning incorrect option groups
ticket.original-body:
Using the demo code from the API documentation: grouped_options = { 'North America' => [['United States','US'], 'Canada'], 'Europe' => ['Denmark','Germany','France'] } grouped_options_for_select(grouped_options)
Produces: <optgroup label="Europe"><option value="Denmark">Denmark</option></optgroup> <option value="Germany">Germany</option> <option value="France">France</option> <optgroup label="North America"> <option value="US">United States</option> </optgroup> <option value="Canada">Canada</option>
The same happens when using nested arrays, as demonstrated by this pastie: http://pastie.org/1375968
ticket.latest-body:
Using the demo code from the API documentation: grouped_options = { 'North America' => [['United States','US'], 'Canada'], 'Europe' => ['Denmark','Germany','France'] } grouped_options_for_select(grouped_options)
Produces: <optgroup label="Europe"><option value="Denmark">Denmark</option></optgroup> <option value="Germany">Germany</option> <option value="France">France</option> <optgroup label="North America"> <option value="US">United States</option> </optgroup> <option value="Canada">Canada</option>
The same happens when using nested arrays, as demonstrated by this pastie: http://pastie.org/1375968
ticket.original-body-html:
Using the demo code from the API documentation:

grouped_options = {
    'North America' => [['United States','US'], 'Canada'],
    'Europe' => ['Denmark','Germany','France']
}
grouped_options_for_select(grouped_options)

Produces:

<optgroup label="Europe"><option value="Denmark">Denmark</option></optgroup>
<option value="Germany">Germany</option>
<option value="France">France</option>
<optgroup label="North America">
<option value="US">United States</option>
</optgroup>
<option value="Canada">Canada</option>

The same happens when using nested arrays, as demonstrated by this pastie: http://pastie.org/1375968
